meanings.sent1: The sharp knife made a woundy cut on his finger.
meanings.sent2: The doctor treated the woundy gash with care.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy chef's knife skills were so woundy, he cut himself every time.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like woundy arrows, piercing his heart.
meanings.sent5: The image of the woundy scar left a lasting impression on her mind.

meanings.sent1: The storm caused a woundy amount of damage to the town.
meanings.sent2: She felt a woundy sense of pride after completing the marathon.
meanings.sent3: The woundy size of the ice cream sundae made her eyes widen in surprise.
meanings.sent4: His woundy excitement for the concert was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The woundy mountain stood majestically against the sky.
